name: twitch
userDescription: Get information about a Twitch channel
userOptionsNameDescription: The name of the Twitch channel
userNotAffiliated: This channel is not part of the Twitch affiliate program

followageDoesNotExist: Either the user or the channel do not exist. Please check that you have written both names correctly.
